Name: SpaceVibes VR (Point & Click, Abstract, Disco Music)
About the game: An Artistic VR “Shooter” Game For Everyone! Enter space and enjoy shooting flying objects with a laser gun while jamming out to the SpaceVibes soundtrack! A game without gore, that doesn’t encourage shooting living things… In fact, you can’t! It’s a fun space shooter that anyone can enjoy; or, at least anyone who’s cool enough to enjoy cool things (basically anyone who’s anyone)! Take a break, and jam out with Space Vibes!
